node.statement: STATIONARITY VIA MULTILINE PROCESS: The stationary distribution of the t-PushTASEP is proportional to f_mu(x;q=1,t). This is proved via the Ferrari-Martin multiline construction: a Markov process on arrays of configurations that projects to the t-PushTASEP on the bottom row and has product-form stationary distribution. The marginal on the bottom row gives weights f_mu(x;q=1,t).
